text: Naci Erdem (28 January 1931 – 28 March 2022) was a Turkish footballer and manager. He played as a centre-back. He played for Fenerbahçe between 1953–63. He capped 605 times in Fenerbahçe history and scored 168 goals. He played 34 times for Turkey and he started as captain 3 times. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Sportspeople from Istanbul
title: Naci Erdem
